body.name: 2023 WiFi Extender, WiFi Extenders Signal Booster for Home Covers Up to 8000 Sq. Ft and 40 Devices, Dual Band 2.4G/5G 1200Mbps Wireless Internet Repeater and Signal Amplifier Easy Setup
features: 【Dual Band AC1200 High Speed】Applied with updated dual band technology, this wireless WiFi booster can choose high-quality band automatically for better performance. The WiFi extenders signal booster for home can offer up to 300Mbps for 2.4GHz and 876Mbps for 5GHz. With a speed of up to 1200Mbps, you will enjoy the high speed network when working, playing games and enjoy music and moives.

【Three Modes Simple Setting】: This WiFi amplifier has three modes. Repeater mode is used to extend the coverage of an existing wireless network.AP mode is used to overlay a wired network to a wireless network. Two Ethernet ports enable connection to any wired Ethernet device, such as a smart TV or desktop.

【Safe Network Access】: This WiFi extender signal booster can maximize network security, ensure your network safety, prevent others from stealing your net, protect your important data and avoid the interference and privacy problems of WiFi.NOTE: All WiFi extenders are designed to increase or improve WiFi coverage, not to directly increase speed.c

【Extend WiFi Coverage】:WiFi repeater boosts Internet WiFi Coverage up to 8000 Square feet and connects up to 40 devices. Extend your Internet wireless network to every corner of your home, rejecting network dead spots.

【Universal Compatibility】: The WiFi range extender is compatible with all WiFi-enabled devices, WiFi routers, or WiFi access points. Examples include smartphones, laptops, tablets, speakers, web cameras, IoT devices, and more.
body.description: What is 1200 WiFi Signal Extender Reliable wireless network speed up to 1200Mbps, covering your bedroom, living room, bathroom, kitchen, garage, balcony and garden. Product Specification Extreme Coverage -- High gain 4 internal antennas with ac technology offer extreme wireless coverage Dual band:Work with 2.4 GHz and 5GHz Simultaneous 1200 Mbps dual band transmission rate, up to 5GHz 867Mbps + 2.4 GHz 300Mbps. Three-in-one: AP, Router, Repeater The difference between 2.4GHz and 5GHz. 2.4GHz: penetration is good, transmission distance is more longer. 5GHz: the speed is more faster ,but the penetration is not better than 2.4G,the speed will get half if there are barriers between the extender and devices In Box 1x Dual Band Wireless WA1200 Range Extender. 1x Quick Installati

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.8 3.8 out of 5 stars 29 ratings 3.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I decided to get this one instead of a more well known brand because when I looked at the specs of them this seemed better. I’m glad I got it and I am impressed because it works really well. It’s got 4 antennas which help it to cover up to 8000sq ft. I like that it is dual band because some of my devices only work on 2.4 while most of my other devices are on 5. There are a few different ways you can use it, too. It has a mode where you can extend coverage of your wireless network, a mode where you can use it as a router so it plugs directly into your modem, and another mode that I honestly don’t really understand so I don’t use it lol. I just have it so that it extends my existing wireless network and it’s great. It also has built in ports for WAN and LAN, easy one button set up using the WPS button, a signal strength light, and lights that tell you what mode you’re using. I haven’t had any problems with connection to it and have not noticed any loss of speed or anything like that. And now I can finally use the wifi in the kitchen :).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My boyfriend bought this for me so I'm sure he did his research. So glad that he did because device resolved my lack of internet issues and was super easy to setup. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work / Cannot connect
reviews.reviewText: Could never connect the device. Terrible instructions. The websites they provide for manual connection do not work. If you have a WPS button on your router, you may be able to connect, but WPS is a hacker's dream. Don't buy this. You'll just be sending it back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This does provide an added boost to the area in the house that needs it but devices have to get connected to this booster. It does not enhance the existing system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is great for me, I was having a problem connecting with wifi in my office room so I bought this product to get an extension of the Wi-Fi range and it solved that problem of irregular connection issue. Now I can work smoothly. I recommend this product if your whole house or office isn't covered by your current router.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our house because we were having wifi issues. It really helped with stopping our tv from buffering while we were watching a show or a movie. We placed it in the room with the most wifi issues. It was easy to install it only took a few minutes. We are purchasing another one to install upstairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not giving a reliable experience
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to give this unit a try. I tried it. It provides an intermittent connection. Works good for streaming but not gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product is easy to set up. Didn’t take that long at all the set up and connect my phone to it. It works great!
